relations.target: behave: behave in a certain manner; show a certain behavior; conduct or comport oneself; 'You should act like an adult'; 'Don't behave like a fool'; 'What makes her do this way?'; 'The dog acts ferocious, but he is really afraid of people' <i21819>
wild: in an uncontrolled and rampant manner; 'weeds grew rampantly around here' <i21163>
